channel.title: Donator Icon showing as a gold crown to other players
channel.description:
Donator Icon are showing up as a gold crown to other players
i have checked the client.java at the modicon's and they all look right to me and the cr's look right too
if anybody knows a fi for this please tell me
or help me VIA teamviewer
thanks :)
